name: DUAL (slvvrmnk)
description:
DUAL! Is a two-player game in which you have to try to hit an enemy ship. The nice thing is that you can play with your friends in person - for this you only need to be connected to the same WiFi network.
DUAL! you will have to pay attention to both your screen and the screen of the enemy. You will follow and shoot the enemy, as well as watch out for the blows that are aimed at you. The shots automatically move from one screen to the next, and you need to dodge them as best you can to win.
To shoot, simply tap the screen or hold your finger for a more powerful attack. To navigate, you only have to tilt your mobile device from side to side and your ship will move accordingly.
DUAL! also allows you to fight not only against other players, but among other things, fight against artificial intelligence, and resist the flow of attacks. This co-op mode adds challenges and can be a great way to have fun with your friends. Limitations
The trial version has a two-minute recording limit
